site_name: Plot H5Elephant ParkElephant RoadLondonSouthwarkSE17 1UB
description: Details of condition 5 (Hard and soft landscaping - of the landscaped courtyard) of planning permission ref. 17/AP/2269 (Approval of reserved matters (access, scale, appearance, layout and landscaping) for plot H5 within Elephant Park (previously referred to as the Heygate Masterplan) submitted persuant to Outline Planning Permission ref 12/AP/1092. The proposals comprise the construction of a development plot ranginf between 8 and 25 storeys in height (maximum building height 85.415m AOD), comprising 384 residential units, 873 sqm (GEA) of flexible retail (A1-A5) uses, 735sqm (GEA) of flexible retail, office and leisure uses (A1-A5/B1/D2), 124sqm (GEA) of flexible retail and office uses (A1-A5/B1) car parking, cycle storage, servicing, plant areas, new landscaping and oher associated works).
